member.name: CERT_POLICY_CONSTRAINTS_INFO
member.summary: The CERT_POLICY_CONSTRAINTS_INFO structure contains established policies for accepting certificates as trusted.

member.name: CERT_POLICY_CONSTRAINTS_INFO.fRequireExplicitPolicy
member.summary: BOOL flag indicating whether explicit policy information is required.

member.name: CERT_POLICY_CONSTRAINTS_INFO.dwRequireExplicitPolicySkipCerts
member.summary: DWORD indicating the number of required explicit policy certificates.

member.name: CERT_POLICY_CONSTRAINTS_INFO.fInhibitPolicyMapping
member.summary: BOOL flag indicating whether policy mapping is inhibited.

member.name: CERT_POLICY_CONSTRAINTS_INFO.dwInhibitPolicyMappingSkipCerts
member.summary: DWORD indicating the number of policy mapping certificates to be skipped.
